Tendrás que asignar los dados que obtengas a vehículos para repararlos, teniendo en cuenta la habilidad única de tu mecánico y que puedes relanzarlos hasta 3 veces.

Cuando completes tu carta de objetivos de victoria, desencadenarás el final de la partida.

Cada coche te da un número de puntos, pero, si logras conjuntos por colores, ¡también puntuarás!
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Passed Action Token, Re-rolling and Locking

name: SEEDS
description:
Welcome to SEEDS! Players take the role of rival Ohio farmers and compete to become the most prolific “seeder” in the midwest!
SEEDS is an exciting set collecting card game with a twist of “push your luck” and a unique scoring system. Players will plant seeds from their hands into fields accessible to all players in an attempt to harvest said fields at just the right moment. Wait too long and someone else might reap what you have sown. Harvest too soon and you will fall behind in points. When harvesting players add matching cards from their hand to the cards that were harvested and score points.(cards in hand x cards harvested = total points)

—description from the designer
mechanics: Hand Management, Push Your Luck, Set Collection

name: The Pioneers of Utopia: Yozakura Kyōsōkyoku
description:
The next stage is night! A richer gaming experience!
The first expansion set of the popular series "Momoiro Dim Sum Girl"!

An expansion set for the popular series "Pink Dim Sum Girl" is now available!
An expansion set packed with elements for advanced users who are not satisfied with the basic set while keeping the fun of "Momoiro Dim Sum Girl"!
You can play with any combination of three expansion elements that can be freely combined.

◆ Expansion 1: Gensokyo at night
The centerpiece of this expansion set!
The game board has been changed to a night specification and the difficulty level has been increased!
Players also acquire various new powers and challenge the development of Togenkyo!

◆ Expansion 2: New Alchemist
Two new characters have appeared!
Overwhelm other players with tricky abilities!

◆ Extension 3: New technique
The number of ways to obtain the important “peaches” in this game has increased!
The range of strategies has greatly increased!

●Adjustment variant

A character card for adjusting the balance of the basic set is included.


【Please be careful! ]
The separately sold "Pink Dim Sum Girl Basic Set" is required to play.

name: Contame: Terror
description:
Contame: Terror (Tell me: Horror) is a narrative game, in which a player draws a card from deck "Histories". Then, he chooses one from deck "Actions" and five from deck "Draws". He must create a story using elements from all the cards, that includes a number of points awarded to the story-teller by the other players if he uses them correctly. With fearsome characters, chilling settings, very scary objects and special effects to create and tell the best horror stories.

After everybody has been the story-teller, the person with more points is the winner.


Before starting, you have to divide the deck into four groups: «Characters», «Scenarios», «Animals + Objects» and «Special Effects». Then each deck is shuffled well and placed face down on the table. The objective will be to tell a horror story. We suggest three ways to play.

name: Smart10: Frågekort 4
description: 100 new cards with 2000 answers.

name: Wandering Towers: Re-Use A Card
description:
Originally available as a bonus for purchasing the game at Spiel 2022.

Extra Magic spell: Use one potion to get the top card from the discard pile.

name: Chronicles of Crime: Tantrum House 2021 Promo Cards
description:
Includes 3 new characters to use in Chronicles of Crime: 70, 71, 72.

Distributed as part of the Tantrum House Season 8 Kickstarter campaign in 2021.
categories: Adventure, Deduction, Expansion for Base-game, Murder/Mystery

name: World of Tanks Miniatures Game: American – M7 Priest
description:
The American M7 Priest gives your Americans some fire support. Use Requesting Fire to get information from your scouting tanks to hit hidden targets, load Burst HE Shells to stun enemies or load Light HEAT Shells for when damage matters more than critical hits.

Contents:
1 Painted Plastic Tank
1 Tank Card
5 Upgrade Cards
Crew Stunned Tokens
Online Bonus Code for New and Existing Players
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Miniatures, Wargame, World War II
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Point to Point Movement, Variable Player Powers

name: World of Tanks Miniatures Game: German – Hummel
description:
The German Hummel SPG hits hard, packing 7 Firepower. Loading Heavy HEAT Shells removes HE and adds Big Gun for when damage matters more than critical hits. Use the SPG-specific upgrades, Burst HE Shell and Requesting Fire, to provide support for your platoon.

Contents:
1 Painted Plastic Tank
1 Tank Card
5 Upgrade Cards
Crew Stunned Tokens
Online Bonus Code for New and Existing Players
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Miniatures, Wargame, World War II
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Point to Point Movement, Variable Player Powers

name: Escape Room: The Game – Snoepfabriek
description:
Your (sugar)uncle Lucas Ollie got entangled in the chewing gum while making the biggest consignment of candy ever. He now needs your help in his candy factory to get everything ready before Halloween. If only you had paid more attention during all those (boring) tours... But then you accidentally discover Lucas' huge secret!

—description from the publisher (translated)
mechanics: Cooperative Game, Deduction, Elapsed Real Time Ending

name: Munchkin: Turtle Carnage
description:
Trust us, it's Turtles All the Way Down!
In Munchkin: Turtle Carnage, we've got a shell-load of great new cards for you! (30, to be exact!) Be careful not to wake the Napping Turtle while you battle the undead Rigor Tortoise with your Hot Rock. And always remember, Slow and Steady wins the race to Level 10!

—description from the publisher
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy
mechanics: Hand Management, Take That, Variable Player Powers

name: Blood Bowl: Second Season Edition – Dark Elf Team Card Pack
description: Full set of reference cards for Dark Elf Blood Bowl teams including position players, special play cards, and Star Players.
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Grid Movement, Variable Player Powers

name: Niemen 1920
description:
Niemen 1920 simulates the Battle of Niemen, one of the biggest battles of the Polish-Soviet War 1919-1921. The battle took place between 15 and 25 September, 1920, near the Niemen River, approximately within the area designated by the cities of Suwałki, Grodno, and Białystok. Soviet armies, defeated by Polish forces during the Battle of Warsaw in August, 1920, tried to establish a defensive line, extending from Polish-Lithuanian border to the Polesie region (Polesia), with the city of Grodno being a pivotal point in the Soviet defences. However, they were outflanked by Polish armies and destroyed, which allowed Polish forces to move further east and eventually reach the Tarnopol-Dubno-Minsk-Drissa line in October, 1920.

The games uses the WB-95 wargaming system by Taktyka i Strategia.
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Grid Movement, Hexagon Grid, Movement Points, Ratio / Combat Results Table, Zone of Control

name: Gnamo: conquista la Toscana
description:
A game of battles and strategy in which 40 territories of Tuscany are fought over by five tribes of wild boars: tourist guides, farmers, citizens, mushroom hunters and "pottini" (bragging people).
In this party game ideal for an evening with friends, you will have to show your strategic side to defeat your opponents with cards, dice and fangs.
Start fighting with only one goal: to conquer all the Great Pigs Reign with the shout of… Gnamo! ("let's go" in Tuscany)

—description from the publisher (translated)

Un gioco di battaglie e strategia in cui 40 territori della Toscana vengono contesi fra cinque tribù di cinghiali: guide turistiche, contadini, cittadini, fungaioli e pottini.
In questo gioco di società ideale per accendere una serata fra amici, dovrai sfoderare il tuo lato strategico per sconfiggere gli avversari a suon di carte, dadi e zanne.
Inizia a combattere con un solo obiettivo: conquistare tutto il Gransuinato al grido di… Gnamo!

—description from the publisher

name: RoRop
description:
To score in RoRop, you must collect wooden blocks.

The game consists of a wooden game board and 36 blocks, six each in six colors. To set up, set the game board up diagonally, then take one block of each color and place one at the bottom of each of the six columns in the game board. Finally, add the other blocks in the columns, taking care not to place the same color orthogonally adjacent.

On a turn, a player chooses a color present on the bottom row of the game board, then takes one or more blocks of this color from the bottom of the board. Keep taking turns until all of the blocks have been claimed, then tally your score.

In the basic game, your score is the number of blocks you claimed. In the intermediate game add to this number the product of the number of different colors you claimed and the number of blocks in your most prevalent color. In the expert game, score the product of the number of different colors you claimed and the number of blocks in your first claimed color, then add the number of blocks you collected.

You can also use the RoRop components to play a four-in-a-row game. Starting with the empty game board, on a turn either (a) add a block to the top of any column or (b) remove a block from the bottom of any column, then place it on the top of any column. If a player takes the (b) action, the next player must take an (a) action, if possible. If you create a line of four blocks of the same color, whether orthogonally or diagonally, you win.

name: A Song of Ice & Fire: Tabletop Miniatures Game – Sunspear Royal Guard
description:
House Martell’s famous Sunspear Royal Guards are few in number but count among the best-trained units across all of Westeros. Their adaptive style lends itself well to both offensive and defensive initiatives, and while their armor is heavier than most Martell units, their physical conditioning allows them to keep pace. As a hard center to a Martell vanguard, the Royal Guards have no match in Martell forces, and their flexibility lets them seize the initiative on the field as the tide of battle shifts.

—description from the publisher
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Novel-based, Wargame
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Hand Management, Measurement Movement, Worker Placement
publishers: CMON Global Limited, Dark Sword Miniatures, Inc.

name: Neo Grimorium
description:
Neo Grimorium is a card crafting game for 2-5 players. Assume the role of a mage as you build your book of spells. It's a race against time as you work diligently to transcribe more arcane knowledge than anyone else.

This fast-paced game uses elements of card crafting, worker placement, hand management, and a point salad style scoring. With over 16 denizen cards that change each game and over 40 clear spell cards, no two games will ever be the same. The game comes in a small form box for easy travel and storage.

Each turn, you play a page from your book and take the action listed on the card. You are given a scorecard that you must use to mark off adornments and focus your power as you transcribe spells and adorn your book you gain levels of the magical elements. But don't forget to increase your influence over the many denizens of the Citadel of Magic so they will lend you their powers.

Will you rise to the top to become the most powerful mage who ever lived?

—description from the designer
mechanics: Deck, Bag, and Pool Building, Worker Placement

name: A Song of Ice & Fire: Tabletop Miniatures Game – Starfall Outriders
description:
House Martell rules the desert, plains, and badlands of southern Westeros under the Sunspear banner. Their troops are garbed in desert robes under light armor, and rank among the fastest forces in the War of the Five Kings. House Martell's doctrine of battle is to strike fast, strike hard, and evade counterattack.

The Starfall Outriders are House Martell's first cavalry unit and scheduled for release in 2023.
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Miniatures, Novel-based, Wargame
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Hand Management, Measurement Movement, Worker Placement
publishers: CMON Global Limited, Dark Sword Miniatures, Inc.

name: Hunt A Killer: Dead on the Vine
description:
One night in July, members of the Llewyn family gather at the family vineyard to celebrate a birthday. After a tumultuous night full of arguments and a big factory malfunction, the clan matriarch, Gail, is found dead in her bed. The police are called and the death is ruled an accident—until the autopsy returns and it’s discovered that Gail was poisoned. Comb through the belongings of the family, analyze their witness statements, and piece together a timeline to determine who killed the vineyard matriarch.

Do you have what it takes to Hunt A Killer? Sort through evidence, decode ciphers, piece together clues, and catch the killer.

Difficulty: 3/5 - Medium
mechanics: Cooperative Game, Deduction, Solo / Solitaire Game, Storytelling

name: Imperial Steam: Promo
description: Increase the variety of the shipment tiles and introduce a brand new city that rewards you with an investor.

name: Ballads & Tales: Journey of the Brave
description:
"Ballads & Tales: Journey of the Brave" is an adventure board game for 1-5 players that retains its roots in immersive dungeon-crawling classics and expands on them with exciting, modern elements. You can choose to adventure with a game master or in solo/co-op mode.

Become a party of daring heroes with your friends and face off against bloodthirsty minions. Travel through dangerous forests, descend into dark dungeons, explore the ruins of formerly magnificent fortresses. Come to the aid of helpless villagers and become fabled heroes that the bards will write ballads and epic poems about.

One player can become the sinister Game master: Your role is to lay cunning traps for the heroes and play your arsenal of perfidious Event Cards that will create ever-changing dangers for the heroes through their many different configurations. Use Weapon Cards to increase the strength of your already fearsome creatures even more. Send out warlords with powerful Boss Cards to pick off the heroes one by one.

The lovingly designed components that allow for the visual creation of many different scenes invite you to dive deep into the magical world of 'Ballads & Tales'. There’s so much to discover:


Dungeons, ruins, forests and villages
Valuable treasures
Magical artefacts
Rare materials to upgrade armor and weapons
Interesting characters


Central to the design of "Ballads & Tales" is the fantastic result of our intensive collaboration with the highly talented artist Valbona Atanaskovska, or Bona for short. Having been fans of her works for a long time, we were overjoyed when she agreed to visualize all of the characters in her unique style.

Instead of just creating the characters digitally on a PC, Bona painted all characters in Ballads & Tales: Journey of the Brave, as well as its expansions, in oil on canvas in loving detail. This passionate effort is rare these days, and it helped turn each character into a highly crafted work of art. Bona’s talent for expressive and aesthetic faces and the nature of radiant oil paints in particular make her paintings and the characters come to life in unique ways and lend an incomparable and nostalgic flair to "Ballads & Tales: Journey of the Brave".

"Description from the designer"
mechanics: Action Points, Cooperative Game, Dice Rolling, Line of Sight, Modular Board, Role Playing

name: DIFFERO
description:
DIFFERO is a game for two players. It is played with a hexagonal board and 13 black and white pieces each.

In this game, you win by calculating the difference in strength between your side and the enemy side, and by supporting your own side or blocking the opponent’s side to reach the goal.

While steadily advancing your own piece, you often find yourself unable to stop the opponent’s pieces that is closing in. This is a fun abstract game with simple rules and thrills.

Components

13 white and 13 black pieces each
Hexagonal board with 5 on a side


End condition

You win when one of your piece reach the goal.
You lose if you cannot move any of your pieces in your turn.


Preparation

Place pieces in predetermined positions.
Choose your own color. White is the first turn.


Play procedure
On your turn, you moves only one of your pieces according to the following rules

The piece moves on a line. The piece may jump over any number of pieces at once, either your own and your opponent’s.
The number of steps to move the piece is always (number of your pieces) − (number of your opponent’s pieces) on the line to be moved. If this value is less than or equal to 0, the piece cannot move on the line.
You cannot move the piece off the board or into a place already occupied by another piece. Also, you cannot move the piece into the opponent’s goal.


—description from the designer

name: World of Tanks Miniatures Game: Soviet – SU-85
description:
Wave 9

1:100 Scale

World of Tanks Miniatures Game is an easy to learn, quick play game, where you take command of a unit of tanks, seeking to destroy your opponent and secure victory! All the models in World of Tanks come ASSEMBLED, PAINTED, and BATTLE READY!

The Soviet SU-85 is a highly mobile Tank Destroyer, best used manoeuvering around the back of the battlefield looking to snipe enemies. Without a turret and having low Initiative, protecting your flanks or adding the V-2-34 engine is a good investment.

Plastic components.

Contents:
1 Miniature
‣ SU-85 Tank
1 Tank Card
5 Upgrade Cards
Online Bonus Code for New & Existing Players
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Miniatures, Wargame, World War II

name: World of Tanks Miniatures Game: American – M18 Hellcat
description:
Wave 9

1:100 Scale

World of Tanks Miniatures Game is an easy to learn, quick play game, where you take command of a unit of tanks, seeking to destroy your opponent and secure victory! All the models in World of Tanks come ASSEMBLED, PAINTED, and BATTLE READY!

The American M18 Hellcat is an aggressive Tank Destroyer that can be used to challenge opponents anywhere on the battlefield. High Firepower, Mobility and Initiative out of the box make it fieldable without upgrades, but some options can really make this tank shine!

Plastic components.

Contents:
1 Miniature
‣ M18 Hellcat Tank
1 Tank Card
5 Upgrade Cards
Online Bonus Code for New & Existing Players
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Miniatures, Wargame, World War II

name: Pokémon TCG: Sword & Shield – Silver Tempest
description:
Argent Adventure & Dazzling Discovery! An ominous rumble echoes in the distance, and Lugia VSTAR emerges from the ocean’s depths to answer its call! Uncharted territory lies waiting to be explored alongside Alolan Vulpix VSTAR, while Serperior, Unown, and Mawile join the expedition as Pokémon VSTAR, and a legendary battle awaits as Regieleki VMAX and Regidrago VSTAR awaken from slumber. Discover powerful partnerships in the Trainer Gallery, and set a course for adventure with the Pokémon TCG: Sword & Shield—Silver Tempest expansion!

—description from the publisher
categories: Card Game, Collectible Components, Expansion for Base-game, Fighting

name: Articles of War: Privateer
description:
It is the age of sail. Distant empires, hungry for the wealth and resources of the New World, have bankrolled colonies on these distant shores. Now, as ancient grudges and rivalries reignite, piracy and privateering are expanding from single-ship engagement into small flotillas commanded by young commodores. Their goal: take the seas back for their home nations, and perhaps win more than a little gold in the process…

Privateer is the first title in the Articles of War series. It is a fast-paced, hex-based naval engagement where 2 to 6 players use a combination of sailing, cannon-fire, and the occasional boarding action to sink or capture the ships belonging to their opponents. For each enemy ship dispatched, a gold doubloon is awarded to the attacker with ultimate victory going to whichever player has the most gold at the end of the game.

The central mechanic of AoW: Privateer is a special dice economy, where the active player rolls a combination of sail and cannonball dice based on the number of ships they have active and their strategic preferences. After rolling, they spend these dice one-by-one in order to maneuver their ships into position and target their cannons to eliminate enemies. Islands and reefs, placed by the players during setup, provide a limitless variety of map arrangements.

—description from the publisher
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Grid Movement, Hexagon Grid, Line of Sight, Player Elimination, Resource to Move, Variable Set-up

name: Kingdom Death: Monster – Screaming Sun Armor
description:
Screaming Sun Armor - Lucy Promo was included with 1 x gear and 1 x hybrid armor set bonus card, while the hard plastic version was included with 2 x gears, 2 x Pattern cards, 1 x Vermin resource and 1 x hybrid armor set bonus card (not part of the Kingdom Death: Monster Base Game).

Gear card sneak peek: Screaming Oni Mask (armor, bone, mask) - Scold. Non-deaf knocked down survivors suffer brain damage and stand. Limit, once per round.

The Screaming Sun Armor - Lucy is packaged in a hand-stamped kraft box and limited to 500. It includes:

1 x Photoresin Screaming Sun Armor - Lucy
1 x Hard Plastic Kingdom Death 30mm round insert and base
2 x Beta Gameplay cards: 1 x gear, 1 x hybrid armor set bonus card
First run collector's edition: Signed and numbered authenticity note
Large Matte Art Print
Character Art Card

The hard plastic version of Screaming Sun Armor - Lucy is packaged in a graphic box. It includes:
1 x Hard Plastic People of the Sun - Screaming Sun Armor
1 x Hard Plastic Kingdom Death 30mm round insert and base
2 x Pattern cards
2 x Pattern gear cards
1 x Hybrid Armor Bonus card
1 x Vermin resource
Large Matte Art Print
Small character art card

Lucy wears the Screaming Oni hybrid armor that transforms the reckless abandon of the screaming armor into a precise tool for maiming monsters.
categories: Adventure, Civilization, Dice, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Fighting, Horror, Mature / Adult, Miniatures
mechanics: Cooperative Game, Critical Hits and Failures, Dice Rolling, Events, Grid Movement, Narrative Choice / Paragraph, Paper-and-Pencil, Role Playing, Scenario / Mission / Campaign Game, Solo / Solitaire Game, Square Grid, Storytelling

name: Ucho
description:
Immerse yourself in the world of the deaf. Forget all sound sensations for a while, guess and express familiar words only by sign language or lip reading.

Cards about sign shows a guide picture of what the sign looks like and a brief description of the basic movement of the hands.

On the Cards about lip-reading are written words from everyday life, knowledge and place names.

Players play in teams. Each team has one colored pieces which puts on the start field on game board. The first playing team moves their piece to the first field with the sign-in picture. After that, one player from the team draws one card of their choice (heavier or lighter) from the respective deck of cards.
The player performs a word (sign only with his hands). If the rest of his team guesses the word within 30 seconds, the team's figure is moved by as many fields as it was on the card (lighter 2 fields, heavier 3 fields). If the team does not guess the word or expression, it is moved forward by 1 field.

After that, the other team plays and so on. During the game the pieces passes a fields with signing or lip reading.

The team that reaches the finish line first wins.

The game is not "just about winning" but about familiarizing the general public with sign language.

This game contents 1 game board, 240 cards (60 about lighter variant of sign, 60 about more complex of sign) and 60 about lip-reading), 6 pieces and 1 hourglass.

name: Tiny Turbo Cars: Time Machine Expansion
description:
Break the boundaries of time with this unique racecar expansion… introducing The Time Machine!

Text says: At the end of your turn, you may execute again 1 command from the 3rd row of your controller.

name: Tiny Turbo Cars: Fantasy Squad Expansion
description:
Hunt monsters, cast magic spells, and join a horde of crazy goblins with the Fantasy Squad Expansion!

3 additional fantasy themed race cars (Bomblin, Dungeon Fighter, and Flying Wish) are accompanied by 2 Junction tiles, introducing more hurdles and perils to your races.

-description from publisher's website

name: Catacombs Conquest: KS Bonus Pack
description:
Twelve additional cards originally offered during the Catacombs Conquest Kickstarter campaign. Six cards for the Sword Team and six cards for the Skull Team.

Sword Team:
Wyvern Ryder, Rabbit Ranger, Lapis Knight, Scarecrow, Bee Familiar, Protector

Skull Team:
Arachnid, Royal Monster, Cyclops, Bear Familiar, Drake, Ratman

—description from the publisher
categories: Action / Dexterity, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy

name: Babaróka karácsonya
description:
Help Baby Fox find all the Christmas ornaments before his friend, Kitten arrives

This is a cooperative children’s game that uses memory and intuition.
Baby Fox invites his kindergarten friend, Kitten, to celebrate Christmas together. We want to put all the ornaments on the christmas tree before Kitten arrives, but Tiny Fox, Baby fox’s little brother spills the ornament box and all the balls, stars and sweets roll under the furnitures. The goal is to find the ornaments and decorate the tree before Kitten arrives.

Each player gets 2 furniture cards and randomly put ornaments under the cards. You can only look at your own ornaments. When it is your turn, you ask the player sitting next to you about their ornaments. You have to choose which furniture you ask about, and what type of ornament are you looking for. Eg: Is there any gingerbread under the sofa? If the answer is yes, then you can put on the Christmas tree all the ornaments of that type from under that furniture card. If the answer is no, you move Kitten one space closer to the tree. Then the next player asks a question and so on. If Kitten reaches the tree before you put all the ornaments up, you loose the game. You win if you finish decorating before Kitten arrives. When you win, you get the present card from the slot in front of the tree, which should be placed there before you start. The present cards show different little presents like a little chocolate, a walk among the neighborhood christmas lights, or a spontaneous dance party.

name: Dust: Falling London – CMON Comics: Vol. 2 Promos
description:
Dust - London Falling Comic and the associated pre-order exclusive content:
8 Figures for a new Dust game (more information yet to be announced!).

name: Cat Avenue
description:
You all are cats from cat star who tries to be born again as a cat with the most potential, by trying to lead a cat to a specific place. Beware! Some of them aren't cat at all!
A rondel-style game in which you will play one of pawed card from your hand to create a pattern for the cat to walk around in a circle tries to find the best cat (or not-a-cat) that suit you and give the most points. The one who has the most fish (or in other words, points) is the winner of the game.
mechanics: Movement Points, Pattern Recognition, Rondel, Set Collection, Take That

name: Innocence Lost: The First Battle of Bull Run, July 21, 1861
description:
Innocence Lost: The Battle of First Bull Run is an introductory level game on the first major battle fought in the US Civil War.

Each turn represents a half hour of time and there are up to 18 turns in the game. Infantry and Cavalry units are Brigades, while Artillery units represent divisional-level batteries. Players issue orders to their various commanders and draw leader activation markers to determine which leader and their subordinate units activate. Assault combat and artillery bombardments are used to resolve combats between opposing units.

Each copy of Innocence Lost is composed of the following:

Three 11 by 17 and three 8.5 by 11 map sheets with game tracks, unit and terrain ID.

128 double-sided, un-mounted counters (mounted counters are available from the publisher for an additional charge)

Six pages of rules

—description from the publisher
mechanics: Chit-Pull System, Dice Rolling, Hexagon Grid, Simulation

name: Das geheimnisvolle Haus
description:
The title translates to "The mysterious House".

Three valuable objects are hidden inside a mysterious house. In order to find them, the players have to solve riddles on each card. Their faithful companion Snuffles is always by their side. But the players can only reveal the house's secrets and solve all the riddles with the help of an UV lamp.

Three exciting chapters provide 20 minutes of fun playing time each. To help solve the riddles, various clue cards can be used for help. Kids can set up the house and explore it in 3D.

Kids who enjoy adventures and riddles will have a great time exploring the 3D house and all its secrets.

name: Angriff auf die Schneefestung
description:
"Angriff auf die Schneefestung" (German for "Assault on the Snow Fort") is an asymmetric microgame for 2 players in postcard format.

The game is played on a grid of 5x5 spaces. Both players secretly choose their actions and then reveal and perform them simultaneously.

One player attacks the snow fort and can only move forward, either straight or diagonally. They win the game by reaching the row right in front of the fort without being caught.

The other player defends the fort and can only move left or right or stay in place. The defender always throws a snowball at the end of their turn. If the attacker is located in the same column as the defender, they get hit and have to retreat 2 spaces. The defender wins by pushing the attacker out of the grid or by ending their action on the same space as the attacker.

-description from designer

name: A Song of Ice & Fire: Tabletop Miniatures Game – Starfall Knights
description:
A good general knows that he climate in which they fight is as important as any other factor during a battle. It does no good if their troops are falling over dead from heat stroke from wearing cumbersome gear, or freezing to death in the bitter cold with nothing but thin mail to protect them.

The hot, oppressive, Dornish climate means that the Starfall Knights, the heavy cavalry from House Dayne, vassals of House Martell, are less armored than most heavy cavalry from across Westeros, but their lighter armor and barding means they are generally faster and able to strike at enemies more tactically. These skilled horsemen can strike from unexpected quarters, using their spears to great effect in close combat with a devastating charge.

Approximate Height:
Bannerman: 80mm
Knight A: 55mm
Knight B: 54mm
Knight C: 70mm


Contents:**



4 Miniatures (50mm Bases)

1 Bannerman
3 Knights
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Miniatures, Novel-based, Wargame
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Hand Management, Measurement Movement, Worker Placement
publishers: CMON Global Limited, Dark Sword Miniatures, Inc.

name: Siege of Queretaro Game
description:
Siege of Queretaro is a low to moderate complexity tactical wargame on the Juarista siege of Queretaro in 1867. The game takes about 90 minutes to play. One player commands the Juarista forces and the other player commands the Mexican Imperial forces.
Command and Event cards influnce movement and combat and vary play.
mechanics: Events, Grid Movement, Hexagon Grid, Simulation, Zone of Control
publishers: Blue Panther, The Historical Game Company, LLC

description:
Originally available during the Dice Tower 2022 Kickstarter Pack E.

Shuffle in with the rest of the cards and proceed as usual.

Text
Blue: Chutes & Marbles
Orange: The Dice Tower

description: A Song of Ice & Fire: Tabletop Miniatures Game – Frozen Shore Hunters includes thirteen miniatures, a unit card, and a special rules card.

name: Fiesta de los Muertos: Promo
description: Eight promo cards: three new restrictions and five new characters.

name: Magic: The Gathering – Core Set 2019 Planeswalker Deck: Liliana, the Necromancer
description:
Planeswalker Decks familiarize players who are interested in Magic with basic strategy, plus the games setting, characters, and mechanics of the latest set. Each deck comes with a foil Planeswalker card not found anywhere else.

Liliana has mastered death and bends it to her will, defying the laws of nature in pursuit of power. Use her skills to raise an army of undead and drain the life from your opponent.

—description from publisher
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Fighting

name: Mister Bluff
description: Boldness, intuition and strategy are essential in this game of pure bluff. The goal is to be able to pass cards by bluffing their value, without making a mistake or being caught by your opponents. Whoever cleverly keeps the most chips at the end of the game wins.
categories: American West, Bluffing, Card Game, Math, Number

name: Magic: The Gathering – Dominaria Planeswalker Deck: Chandra, Bold Pyromancer
description:
Planeswalker Decks familiarize players who are interested in Magic with basic strategy, plus the games setting, characters, and mechanics of the latest set. Each deck comes with a foil Planeswalker card not found anywhere else.

Chandra is an expert pyromancer. Use her flames to incinerate the opposition before finishing them with massive creatures.

—description from publisher
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Fighting

name: The Hunger: Rosa d'Oro Promo Card
description:
This is a promo card

10 points
Ready, Unique, Permanent

Discard this card to play a card from your discard pile.
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Horror
mechanics: Deck, Bag, and Pool Building, Player Elimination, Push Your Luck, Race
publishers: Cranio Creations, Geronimo Games, Pegasus Spiele, Renegade Game Studios

name: Chamber of Wonders: Paleontologists Club KS Promo
description:
A two card KS exclusive promo included for backers. One card includes the instructions, while the other is the club card.

The Paleontologists Club is a new Club Card that you can use in your games. Membership in this Club will allow you to create complete Beasts using the same anatomical part twice, so you can then form bizarre creatures with 2 heads or 2 bodies!

name: CoComelon: Pattern Party
description:
Go for a spin with JJ and the CoComelon crew! Spin and match the character, colour, shape, or pattern. Each player gets their own spinner, and whenever someone spins SWAP!, you all switch spinners! Spin, match, and play at the Pattern Party! As the #1 Kids YouTube channel in the world and consistently featured in Netflix’s Top 10 lists, CoComelon is one of the most beloved and recognizable names in early childhood entertainment and education.

—description from the publisher

name: がはくずかん (Gahakuzukan)
description:
がはくずかん (Gahakuzukan) is a trick-taking game where players first draw animals on the cards. The suits of the cards are the animals' habitats and their weight is the rank.

After the card play is complete, players attempt to guess who drew the pictures on each of the cards they won. If they are correct, points are scored.

The player with the most points after two hands wins.

name: Бомба (The bomb)
description:
Бомба ("The bomb") is a game of explaining words. Everything is simple: first you explain by words, then by gestures and facial expressions, and then by one word. You choose names, neutral words, and locations and explain them each time in a new order and in a new way. By the end of the game, you can reach such an understanding with the team that, everyone will recognize Lincoln by one wave of hand! The team that guesses the most words wins.

—description from the publisher

name: Firesiege: A Feralis Story
description:
Firesiege. A feralis story is a limited-information cooperative game. Each player controls a Valkun Hero with unique abilities and skills, and turn after turn you play action cards to resist the siege of the army of Skreel that are crawling into the city of Medda to kill your leader Norad. The enemy army is nearly infinite, thus to win, your troops must outmaneuver the Skreel by fulfilling different goal cards (E.g., sealing the three Nests of the Skreel, rescuing inhabitants of the citadel of Medda, recruiting enough Marall mercenaries to overcome the enemy, and so on) till they have managed to flip all 6 Banner tokens on the Victory side. Each game will present players with a different challenge depending on the Goal cards selected!

Be aware though, that each action in battle triggers a reaction: i.e., when playing a card, you get to know only one side of it - while all the other players know the other side but not the one you know.
Communication is crucial to success, but of course, in battle, you are not entirely free to speak out loud about your plans...
Both sides of the card you play must be resolved, and one is always good (light side) while the other will affect you negatively (shadow side). If your Hero dies in battle, an enemy sneaks into the city center, or the Incubation track reaches its maximum, the game is immediately lost… Choose wisely which and when effects should be played, as all actions have consequences and any card could be the last one!

—description from the publisher
mechanics: Communication Limits, Cooperative Game, Scenario / Mission / Campaign Game, Variable Set-up

name: Next War: Iran
description:
The Middle East has long been a hobgoblin for foreign powers and, as much as Afghanistan, also a graveyard of empires. Sitting squarely astride ancient trade routes and with the added impetus of the world's addiction to oil, the area has been a hot spot for centuries.
Now, with the old regime teetering and losing its grip, Iran makes a bid for forcing the West to recognize its complete sovereignty and control over its own affairs by striking at the one thing they care about: the flow of oil. Mining the Straits of Hormuz and declaring it closed to all traffic, Iran defies the world. The US, and perhaps some of its allies, takes action to re-open the straits and get the black gold flowing to the world again.
Next War: Iran is the sixth game in the Next War series. It is unique in the series in that the Allied player has to do the attacking while the non-Allied player attempts to defend its territory against neo-imperial oppression. With a long logistical tail, few true allies in the region, and the menace of Iran's A2AD capabilities, re-opening the Straits is a tall order.
—description from the publisher

name: Precision Ski Jumping
description:
A print and play sports simulation using cards and dice to replay ski jumping tournaments, including season play for men's and women's events.

The roll of a number of dice will determine the outcome of each jump with each jumper having two attempts with the second-round field being limited to the top qualifiers from the first jump. Scores are determined by distance jumped and style points with each result being influenced by the skier's real life performance in the season being replayed.
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Simulation, Solo / Solitaire Game

name: Minigolf Designer: Minigolf Empire Extension
description:
An extension for the Minigolf Designer board game, bringing new design challenges, a campaign mode and event cards.

The box also contains a Putting Dice mini-Game that let you play through the minigolf course that you have designed, using custom dice to simulate your putt.

name: Carnevale: Magic Cards
description:
This deck of cards depicts the five different disciplines of magic. The pack contains 36 cards, each with a magic spell on for quick reference and ease of play, along with a cover card detailing their use.

With lavish artwork and easy to read rules, this deck is the ideal purchase for anyone looking to use magic in their games of Carnevale.

Made from high quality playing card material, these cards are oversized at 100mm x 60mm.

—description from the publisher
categories: Adventure, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Miniatures, Wargame

name: Carnevale: Agenda Cards
description:
These 36 cards contain every Agenda in the game, from killing opposing leaders to falling into the canal. Simply draw the cards and follow the rules on the cover card to score extra Victory Points in your games of Carnevale.

With lavish artwork and easy to read rules, this deck is the ideal purchase for anyone playing Carnevale. This upgrade to the rules in the rulebook makes picking Agendas easier than ever, and provides you with a handy reminder throughout the game!

Made from high quality playing card material, these cards are oversized at 100mm x 60mm.

—description from the publisher
categories: Adventure, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Miniatures, Wargame

name: Magic: The Gathering – Core Set 2021 Planeswalker Deck: Garruk, Savage Herald
description:
Planeswalker Decks familiarize players who are interested in Magic with basic strategy, plus the games setting, characters, and mechanics of the latest set. Each deck comes with a foil Planeswalker card not found anywhere else.

Cursed no longer, Garruk is free to stalk the multiverse for the prey of his choosing. Overrun your opponent with a ceaseless stampede of really, really big creatures.

—description from publisher
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Fighting

name: Ibyron: City of Cards
description:
The Tale of Ibyron
There, it stood amongst the flames of their enemies: their homes, their lives, their city.
The only thing that the people of Ibyron could do was leave the village to burn under its new management. And so they did...
A voyage of what boats they could find that were not burned up by the intruders was the current plan, a plan that would bring the citizens of the once famed Ibyron City, back to a civilized society. But this time - this time, they would prepare for war as well. They would not be outmanuevered as they just were. Preparation of war must be on the agenda to save their new home from the unknown and known enemies.
First things first. They had to get to work building up their new land to the glory it once stood for. Every citizen would have a job, and each would build on the skills of others to create a citizenship only heard of through a Bard's lyrical stylings on the side of a road, begging for some alms to make ends' meet.
This would be the fate of the new Ibyron.

Theme aside, this is a card game. The goal of the game is to construct all tier-3 building cards ( or trash them [solo game], removing them from the game). Each turn workers are able to be used as a resource, depending which workcamp is organized (played sideways). Cards spent as workers can be drawn into the hand to be used as a workcamp or constructed as a building with abilities to help with constructing other buildings.
As cards are discarded they go to the top of the deck if they are used as a worker. Cards discarded as a workcamp are discarded to a discard pile. The game takes around an hour or less.

—description from the designer
categories: Card Game, City Building, Farming, Industry / Manufacturing, Print & Play
mechanics: Chaining, Melding and Splaying, Multi-Use Cards, Solo / Solitaire Game

name: Word Garden
description:
Word Garden is a competitive word-building card game for 1-4 players. You and your friends live in a neighborhood where nothing is more important than having the nicest garden on the block. Players build three gardens using stacks of clear cards, forming as many words as possible in their completed gardens. Play your cards right, and you'll earn the title of Master Gardener!

Play centers around two decks of double-sided acrylic cards, each containing a pattern of letter-covered plants. Players simultaneously choose one of four cards from their hand to plant in their gardens. The remaining cards are then passed left and a new card is drawn from the deck. This process is repeated for a total of 12 rounds, with each player forming three gardens of 4 cards each by stacking them on top of each other.

Each completed garden contains 16 plants that form a 4 x 4 letter grid. Points are scored from words formed within the grid as well as from personal and shared goals. The player who scores the most total points wins the game.

A Solo Mode is also included with three levels of AI difficulty. Play occurs similarly except that, rather than being passed, unused cards are assembled into gardens for the AI, whose goals are revealed over time. Score more points than the AI to win the game.

—description from the designer
mechanics: End Game Bonuses, Hidden Victory Points, Layering, Once-Per-Game Abilities, Open Drafting, Solo / Solitaire Game, Spelling

name: 7 Wonders: Societas Praeficarum Guild Promo Card
description: At the end of the game, gain 1 victory point for each Military Victory token in your neighbors’ Cities

name: Iwari: Metal Totem
description:
The Metal Totem Pawn can be used instead of the wooden Totem Connection Scoring Marker, or it can be used as a small expansion.

Set-up:
• Place the Metal Totem Pawn on top of the connection number “1”.

Gameplay:
• When a player places a Totem in a territory adjacent to the connection with the Metal Totem Pawn, the player is allowed to perform either of the two following actions, at the end of their turn:

A. Immediately score the connection with the Metal Totem Pawn for all involved players, even if the scoring doesn’t generate points to any player. Then, move to the next connection number in ascending order. If the Metal Totem Pawn is on the highest connection number and it needs to be moved, it has to be removed from the board.

B. Do nothing
categories: Abstract Strategy, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy
mechanics: Area Majority / Influence, Hand Management, Network and Route Building, Open Drafting

name: Happy Little Dinosaurs: Ambushed Promo Card
description:
Convention promo card for 2023

Card Text
If you would add this card to your Disaster Area, move it to the bottom of the Disaster deck instead, then look at the top 3 cards of the Disaster deck. Return them to the top of the Disaster deck in any order.
categories: Animals, Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Humor, Number, Party Game, Prehistoric
mechanics: Card Play Conflict Resolution, Hand Management, Player Elimination, Push Your Luck, Set Collection, Take That, Variable Player Powers

name: Kurasaku
description:
The traditional sake businesses in Japan are facing new challenges and are in need of your strategic management skills. As a Kumamoto, the owner of a sake brewery, your job is to allocate your workers effectively to sell sake based on market demands that change every year. Become the best brewery by earning as many victory points as possible.

Kurasaku is a competitive board game where each player runs a sake brewery. With limited resources such as funds and personnel, players will need to secure their ingredients, invest in equipment, brew their sake, and sell it to run their business.

While monitoring other players and market demands, you might try mass production at low prices, or you can shoot for a come-from-behind victory by brewing and selling a finely aged and more expensive product. The game boasts the players can learn about brewing and the business while they play.

name: Home Run: The Baseball Dice Game
description:
Recreate all the action of the ballpark with this tabletop baseball game that will have you getting base hits and scoring runs just by rolling the dice! With each combination of rolled dice representing a play, grab your teammates and see whose team can rack up the most runs and which team will strike out. It's just the thing to add a fun new twist to America's favorite pastime!

—description from the back of the box

The game board is a stylized baseball diamond, with a dry-erase scoreboard at centerfield, twelve metal pegs in two different colors, with holes for the pegs at each base location on the diamond. The pegs fit into two "dugouts" of six holes each on opposite sides of the board.

After determining team names and which team is home and visitor, the players write the team names on the scoreboard with the provided marker. The visitor player places one of their pegs at home plate as the batter, and rolls the two dice once. The result is compared to the chart on the playing board, and the runner is either out, or scores a single, double, triple, or home run. If the runner is out, that peg is placed on the lowest numbered open "OUTS" hole on the scoreboard. If the runner advances, the peg is placed in the hole at the proper base location. If a run is scored, the number on the scoreboard is adjusted with the marker and that peg is returned to the dugout.

Play proceeds until the visitor player has three outs, then the home player repeats the process for the bottom half of the inning. The two players may play a full nine innings, or some agreed-upon shorter game. The game can be played by two players or teams.

—user summary

name: A Song of Ice & Fire: Tabletop Miniatures Game – Lysene Sellswords
description:
A Song of Ice & Fire: Tabletop Miniatures Game – Lysene Sellswords adds new characters to this game, with the Lysene Sellswords giving other factions access to the Pillage mechanism that was previously available only to Greyjoy players. When attacking, they get stronger based on the number of pillage tokens they obtained.

—description from the publisher
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Miniatures, Novel-based, Wargame
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Hand Management, Measurement Movement

name: A Song of Ice & Fire: Tabletop Miniatures Game – Brazen Beasts
description: A Song of Ice & Fire: Tabletop Miniatures Game – Brazen Beasts add new characters to play.
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Miniatures, Novel-based, Wargame
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Hand Management, Measurement Movement

name: Dracho Karacho
description: The dragons are arranged face down around a volcano. When it's my turn, I uncover a dragon one by one. I have to say beforehand whether this dragon is faster or slower than its predecessor. If I am wrong, my turn is over. If I am right, I can continue until I have three dragons of one color face up. I can take these, which is rewarded with points.
